hadiths.text: Umar b. Muhammad b. Zaid reported that he heard his father narrating from Ibn 'Umar that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) had said. If bad luck is a fact, then it is in the horse, the woman and the house

chapter.ara-name: باب الطِّيَرَةِ وَالْفَأْلِ وَمَا يَكُونُ فِيهِ الشُّؤْمُ
chapter.eng-name: (Evil) Omens And Al-Fa'l, And That Which May Be Regarded As Inauspicious
